column7: Teaches students to apply principles of professional communication to the writing tasks typical of specific disciplines or professions. Assignments will vary, depending on the focus of the course, but will include a substantial report or project. Credit is not given for both BTW 263 and either BTW 250 or BTW 261. Prerequisite: Sophomore standing and completion of campus Composition I requirement.
column9: Credit is not given for both BTW 263 and either BTW 250 or BTW 261. Prerequisite: Sophomore standing and completion of campus Composition I requirement.
